description.p: Your Strength score increases by 1.
Your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Your Constitution score increases by 1.
Your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Your Charisma score increases by 1.
Your Strength score increases by 2.
Your Dexterity score increases by 2.
Your Constitution score increases by 2.
Your Intelligence score increases by 2.
Your Wisdom score increases by 2.
Your Charisma score increases by 2.
You increase one Ability by 2, or two Abilities by 1 to a max of 20.

sheet.description: You increase one Ability by 2, or two Abilities by 1 to a max of 20.

description.p: Your Charisma increases by 1 to a max of 20, profiency bonus is doubled for deception and performance checks and grants those proficiencies.

sheet.description: Your Charisma increases by 1 to a max of 20, profiency bonus is doubled for deception and performance checks and grants those proficiencies.

description.p: +5 to initiative and can't be surprised

sheet.description: +5 to initiative and can't be surprised

description.p: Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1 to a max of 20. Climbing speed is now the same is your normal speed. When you are prone, standing up uses only 5 feet of your movement

sheet.description: Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1 to a max of 20. Climbing speed is now the same is your normal speed. When you are prone, standing up uses only 5 feet of your movement

description.p: When you use your action to Dash, you can use a bonus action to make one melee weapon attack or to shove a creature. If you move at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before taking this bonus action, you either gain a +5 bonus to the attack's damage roll (if you chose to make a melee attack and hit) or push the target up to 10 feet away from you (if you chose to shove and you succeed)

sheet.description: When you use your action to Dash, you can use a bonus action to make one melee weapon attack or to shove a creature. If you move at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before taking this bonus action, you either gain a +5 bonus to the attack's damage roll (if you chose to make a melee attack and hit) or push the target up to 10 feet away from you (if you chose to shove and you succeed)

description.p: When you make a blaster pistol attacks within melee range, the attack rolls do not have disadvantage

sheet.description: When you make a blaster pistol attacks within melee range, the attack rolls do not have disadvantage

description.p: When attacked while wielding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with, you can use a reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus to your Armour Class, possibly causing the attack to miss

sheet.description: When attacked while wielding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with, you can use a reaction to add {{defensive duelist:ac}} to your Armour Class, possibly causing the attack to miss

description.p: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield two-handed weapons.

sheet.description: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield two-handed weapons.

description.p: Your Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20, you regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest.

sheet.description: Your Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20, you regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest.

description.p: you need medium armour proifiency: You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20

sheet.description: you need medium armour proifiency: You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20

description.p: you need heavy armour profiency: Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20, Incoming damage from kinetic attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

sheet.description: you need heavy armour profiency: Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20, Incoming damage from kinetic attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

description.p: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

sheet.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

description.p: You gain 3 Luck Points, which you can use to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, or Saving Throws, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Rolls.

sheet.description: You gain 3 Luck Points, which you can use to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, or Saving Throws, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Rolls.

description.p: When you wear Medium Armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

sheet.description: When you wear Medium Armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

description.p: Your movement speed increases by 10 feet, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash, If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

sheet.description: Your movement speed increases by 10 feet, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash, If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

description.p: you need light armour proficiency: You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20

sheet.description: you need light armour proficiency: You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20

description.p: When attacking with a lightstaff, lightsaber pike, vibrostaff, vibrospear, electrostaff, vibropike you can make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

sheet.description: When attacking with a lightstaff, lightsaber pike, vibrostaff, vibrospear, electrostaff, vibropike you can make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

description.p: You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws.
Your Strength increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Strength Saving Throws.
Your Dexterity increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Dexterity Saving Throws.
Your Constitution increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.
Your Intelligence increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Intelligence Saving Throws.
Your Wisdom increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Wisdom Saving Throws.
Your Charisma increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency in Charisma Saving Throws.
When making weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

sheet.description: When making weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

description.p: When an enemy within melee range attacks an ally, you can use a reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel Feat, You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks, and when you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

sheet.description: When an enemy within melee range attacks an ally, you can use a reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel Feat, You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks, and when you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

description.p: Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules, Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

sheet.description: Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules, Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws while wielding a shield. If a force ability forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use a reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage. On a failed Saving Throw, you only take half damage. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage.

sheet.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws while wielding a shield. If a force ability forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use a reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage. On a failed Saving Throw, you only take half damage. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage.

description.p: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills or 1 skill and 1 tool of your choice.

sheet.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills or 1 skill and 1 tool of your choice.

description.p: Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained

sheet.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained
